Dr. Loretta Micro-Exfoliating Cleanser

Brand: Dr. Loretta

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Active Ingredient: 2% Salicylic Acid, Inactive ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Cocamide MIPA, Salicylic Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Salix

Cocamide MIPA, Salicylic Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Glyceryl Undecylenate.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
